Description: Textile fragment woven in undyed linen; decorated with two parallel bands of pseudo-Kufic inscription woven in brown wool on a beige background; textile stained and folded; on the back, both selvedges are sewn together (tunic sleeve ?). Warp: linen, undyed, S, 20/cm Weft: linen, undyed, Z, 16/cm Weft: wool, brown and linen, undyed,S, 44/cm
Acquisition name: Donated by: Maj William Joseph Myers (executors of)
